string.text: I need answers to several questions...
Ask away. I'll try to help
Firstly, where are my things?
The leader usually keeps all the confiscated stuff. His room's on the top floor. My belongings were taken there when they caught me...
Thanks!
How can I get out of here?

When they were leading me around, I noticed a sewer grate under the stairs on the first floor. If you managed to open the cell, it should be possible to get out of here using that sewer...\nThen go West, and use the tunnel to get to Freedom
Thanks for the information
Who captured us?

We're being held by the Mercs. Nobody really knows who they are, but there are rumours that they work with foreign intelligence services. The location of this base is top secret - no one knows how to get into the Dead City. There are many people who'd be very interested in this information - especially Freedom and Duty
Go on...
If you manage to get a map of the Dead City, a successful assault will be possible. The Mercs or the Bandits will probably have one. You should try to get it
Thanks for your info
What do you know about this place?

The city is split into two sections. We're on the Merc side. To the South, beyond the square, is where the Bandits are. They're holed up in the school building, southwest of the city. In between the bases, there's a run-down five storey building, and a few relatively intact ones. If the shit hits the fan, you can sit it out in one of those. There are also some garages, and a couple of small houses around that area. There are two five storey buildings and a dozen garages on the Bandits' side also. On the other side of the square is the former city council building
Thanks for the information
Who's in charge here?
A truly nasty guy named Dushman. I've seen him carrying around a folder full of documents a few times. I reckon there's something interesting inside...
Thanks
Nope, nothing...
Strelok! Where the hell have you been? I haven't seen you or the guys since the last raid! I was getting worried!
So, you feeling better? You thinking clearly?
Strelok?

Yeah, you're Strelok! Who else would you be? I'm Doc, don't you recognize me? What happened to you, my friend? You don't look well. We were in the Zone together for two years. You really don't remember me?
No I'm sorry, I don't...
You don't? Strelok, what the...? You're not joking around, are you? Man... what about the team? Fang? Ghost? You remember them, don't you?
I don't remember Fang, and Ghost is dead - I found his body in Yantar
Ghost? Dead? Dammit, how could that happen? They... they were the best. What happened to you?
I don't... I don't know what happened. I don't remember...

Wait, I need to calm down. That's some really shitty news, man. I think it's all linked with your last trip into the Zone. When we saw each other last, you left me the key to the stash at Pripyat and the map of how to find it. I've managed to keep it hidden from the Mercs. Here, take it. Hide it well. Perhaps you'll find something there. You were saying that there's some kind of trick with the Monolith - but I don't understand what it was about, and you didn't either...
I see. Where are we? I don't remember how I got here...
We're in the Dead City! In the Merc camp...
We're in the Dead City! In the Merc camp...
By the way, I have information on the Mercs. Interested?
Depends on what it is...
I have a map which details the location of their base - the guard posts, ways to get in and out without being noticed, and a lot more...
Sounds valuable. I'll give you 3,000 for it
Deal. Here...
Great! Here's your reward. Soon Stalkers will be arguing about whether Mercs even existed at all!
No, that's not enough...
As you wish. I'm not giving you any more...
Nothing worthwhile. Just the usual gossip, sorry
If you find out something more specific, come back. I'll pay you...
